CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hope Bancorp Inc is a bank holding company engaged in providing financial services. It offers core business banking products for small and medium-sized businesses and individuals. Services offered by the bank include online banking, mobile banking, mortgage loans, credit cards, investment and wealth management services and other banking services.

value.name: Peter Koh
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Executive VP
